abstracts.cdata!:
The project will assist the local
            authorities in Southern Jiangsu to strengthen their
            environmental planning and management capabilities, and to
            carry out priority initiatives in the regional environmental
            strategy and action plans in an efficient and effective
            manner. The main project components will comprise: (a) a
            line of credit for large-scale industrial pollution control
            subprojects in the urban areas of Suzhou, Wuzi, Changzhou
            and Zhenjiang; small-scale industrial pollution control
            subprojects and pilot township and village industrial
            enterprise environmental management subprojects in Greater
            Suzhou and Wuzi; (b) construction of municipal facilities
            for urban wastewater management in Wuxi, Changzhou and
            Zhenjiang; (c) establishment of solid and hazardous waste
            management registration centers (in Jiangsu and Wuxi) and a
            hazardous material emergency response center in Wuxi, and
            construction of a hazardous material storage and
            transshipment facilities in Wuxi; and (d) technical
            assistance and training for the provincial and municipal
            environmental protection bureaus, municipal sewerage
            companies, hazardous material storage company and the
            industrial subproject financial agent (China Investment
            Bank, Jiangsu Branch).
